Reviews.Title: “Good location - very basic”
Reviews.Author: farrahmu
Reviews.Content: booked hotel left basic frills staff ok clinically clean hot water shower mildly warm absolutely pressure 4 keys street annoying paper thin walls people lots slamming doors morning didnt breakfast didnt look overly appetising campo de fiori piazza navona etc corner

Reviews.Title: “very good location terrible breakfast”
Reviews.Author: mpr1971
Reviews.Content: location hotel clean modest lucky probably tv set fridge phone breakfast poor cheap breakfast hotel worst coffee italy real pity price location worth pay staff beside short rude girl doesnt speak word english suggest owner please serve cheap breakfast upset guest

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfortable beds, air conditioning and hot water problems”
Reviews.Author: DannyE44
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights pretty satisfied hotel provided advertised location clean kosher breakfast tv phone time front desk staff price below hotels accomodations walked jewish ghetto synagogue vatican major sites trevi fountain forum piazzas monuments internet center street arrived airport morning hours checkin time staff accomodating able keys luggage ready washrooms huge help night airconditioning 1 am compressor 5 am hot hard sleep windows solution noise main street mornng hot water shower spoke helpful front desk clerk explained hot water fixed indeed compressor saving money neighbor complaints noise event arranged fan hot water fixed 2 3rd night

Reviews.Title: “Superb location for sightseeing, super clean and comfy rooms. Not gluten-free friendly.”
Reviews.Author: Bibipatata
Reviews.Content: location superb 10 minutes piazza navona 15 minutes pantheon 20 minutes fori imperiali 30 minutes colosseum foot saint peters square 2025 minutes foot bought bus pass weekend realised easily tour rome foot thanks location bb lovely spotless air con bathroom spotless impressed standard cleaning found value considering location opinion negative breakfast found poor quality gluten free option lovely bar nearby bar offer lovely cappuccinos pastrys

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable - excellent room & shower- ex. location”
Reviews.Author: tzfoni
Reviews.Content: hotel actually 13 fashion building reception breakfast location 515 minutes spot rome close ghetto kosher restaurants eat kosher breakfast simple kosher noise streetbut shower 5 star hotels israel leak shower fixed girl reception advice restaurants neighborhood reccomend especially people kosher food look central nice clean polite staff

Reviews.Title: “Great alternative for central and not expensive hotel”
Reviews.Author: TlvTamy
Reviews.Content: travelling mother recommend hotel hotel verry central located via vittorio min walk piazza navona campo de fiori hotel actually 1 floor building 13 nice warm staff verry nice nice parquet floor toilets bath looks brand beds comfortable lot storage breakfast simple fine conclusion hotel cars stay center rome hotel facilities
